front.title: Problem Statement of Peer-to-Peer Streaming Protocol (PPSP)

abstract.t: Peer-to-Peer(P2P for short) streaming systems show more and more popularity in current Internet with proprietary protocols. This document identifies problems of the proprietary protocols, proposes a Peer to Peer Streaming Protocol(PPSP) including tracker and peer signaling components, and discusses the scope and uses cases of PPSP.
